title: LISTEN: La Liga Weekly podcast - Jon Driscoll and Terry Gibson
description: Listen to the latest edition of the La Liga Weekly podcast as Jon Driscoll and Terry Gibson discuss all the big talking points from the weekend.
content:
The pair reflect on whether Zinedine Zidane should be sacked after Real Madrid were handed yet another home defeat in the league after a 1-0 defeat to Villareal.
There is also talk about whether Barcelona can go unbeaten this season after they beat Real Sociedad 4-2 at the Anoeta Stadium on Sunday evening.
Lastly, the discussion moved onto Barca's nearest rivals in the table and whether it would be possible for Diego Simeone to keep Antoine Griezmann, Kevin Gameiro and Diego Costa all happy.
Listen to the La Liga Weekly podcast and subscribe via iTunes
